title: YouAppi Adapter Params
description: A schema which validates params accepted by the YouAppi adapter

reward.description: An integer defining the reward (skip) from YouAppi

region.description: A string defining region for choosing the closest YouAppi endpoint

skadn_supported.description: A bool config to determine if SKADN is supported by YouAppi

mraid_supported.description: A bool config to determine if MRAID is supported by YouAppi
